name: Interactive Boss RC-505.
description:
This is my first post on Figma! I'm a little nervous haha.


One day I was browsing Figma's instagram, and I found Mik Skuza post about BOSS guitar effects.


As a musician by hobby I just loved it, and I decided to do the same with this BOSS RC-505 Loopstation.


I have done this as a personal challenge, so I can practice shapes, gradients, interactions and other things that Figma offers.


This loopstation is made with the interactives components beta. So if you have the beta, you will be able to smash all the buttons and sliders you find on the prototype ;).


I'm an UX/UI student, so all contructive feedback is always welcome!


Thanks for reading and I hope you like it as much as I liked doing it!
